nodes.text: The Opposition were a theatrical performance troupe on the moon of the Inner Rim planet Pijal, led by Halin Azucca. The Opposition was created to inform the Pijali citizens of the misrepresentation of the moon's population due to influence from the Czerka Corporation. Their acts and pranks were harmless, but they were framed for more violent acts by the blackguards, a secret division of the Pijal royal guard loyal only to Princess Fanry.
The Opposition appeared in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel by Claudia Gray.
